response.answer_text: Well how powerful is Mukesh Ambani? In the picture his reaction is also like “You are asking how powerful I am?, well it's beyond imagination of common folks like you”  Controls a large chunk of India's economy:- India is one of the largest economies in the world and his conglomerate RIL controls 2.8% of India's economy , it may look neglible but it's huge in reality, he also provides employment to a large number of workforce directly and indirectly which also gives him a lot of political leverage.  Recent example of his political leverage is removal of RBI governer Urjit Patel because according to some sources he refused to give loans to RIL due to economic reasons.  His contacts and friendships :- Well we all know that daughter of Mukesh Ambani recently got married to Anand Piramal, the guest list just shows how powerful he is, some insights are Hilary Clinton  The former first lady of USA is known to attend very less personal family functions of other people but still she attended wedding of Isha Ambani and that too with full enthusiasm, which just shows how powerful and influential Mukesh Ambani is, if a person can have cold and professional former first lady of USA as guest for his daughter's wedding you definitely can count him as one of the most powerful person in the world. Bollywood celebrities  Well these celebrites are treated as demi gods by Indians and are hugely revered across the world, they also attended his daughter's wedding, not only that they also served food to the guests  The person who can make the very own Mahanayak and Badshah serve food in his daughter's wedding is definitely a powerful guy. The symbols of his wealth and power :- Well Mukesh Ambani is one of the richest person in the world and in modern day Wealth = Power, His wealth needs no introduction but still some insights into his humongous wealth :- His Residence i.e Antilia :- Second Most expensive private residence next only to Buckingham palace, worth $2 billion  His Transportation toys :- You would never see him in First class of best airlines let alone other classes as he has private jet collection worth around $200 million or 1500 crore ruppes     He won't travel in some common Audi or BMW, he will travel in the most luxurious and safest car this world can provide    When he feels to get into sea you won't see him in a small compact yacht he likes to sail in this big toy  Conclusion The power and Influence of Mukesh Ambani is beyond our imagination, he is one the richest and most powerful persons in the world , he has the ability to influence governments, Causing economic crashes, making or ruining lives, Making this world a better or worst place , he may not be as powerful as Trump, Putin or Modi but definitely powerful enough to have the ability to influence their decisions to some extent because of the stake he holds in national and international economy and scenario. Thank you and Namaste
